revised_title: A Study of a New Equiatomic Compound of Bicyanide with Binoxide of Mercury
tldr: The author investigates a new equiatomic compound of bicyanide with binoxide of mercury and its properties. The compound exhibits interesting reactions and has a strong alkaline reaction. It is found to be anhydrous and consists of carbon, nitrogen, mercury, and oxygen. The study provides insights into the composition and properties of this compound and its potential applications in chemistry.
